source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT (count(1) / 50) + 1 AS recordcount
FROM dbo.SAP_ORDER_DATA sod
JOIN WMBESMbny2gto wmb ON sod.TRACKNO = wmb.TRACK_NO
WHERE wmb.STATUS = 'Q' 
  AND wmb.transfer_status != 'P';

SELECT 
    sod.MANDT, sod.TRACKNO, sod.Z_ITEM_NO, sod.Creation_Date, sod.CREATED_BY, sod.ORDER_TYPE, sod.CONTRACT_NO, sod.PROJ_ID, sod.CUSTOMER_ID, sod.PO_NUM, sod.PO_Date, 
    sod.REQ_DELI_DATE, sod.OVER_DELIVERY_TOLERANCE, sod.UUNDER_DELIVERY_TOLERANCE, sod.ITEM_NO, sod.MATL_NO,					
    sod.ORD_QTY, sod.SALES_UOM, sod.NUMERATOR, sod.UOM_1, sod.DENOMINATOR, sod.UOM_2, sod.HG_ITEM_NO, sod.VALUATION_TYPE, sod.SO_NO, sod.BATCH_NO,					
    sod.SO_STATUS, sod.BT_STATUS, sod.BBS_NO, sod.BBS_DESC, sod.SHAPE_CODE, sod.Z_SHAPE_SURCHARG, sod.Z_PROD_DATE, sod.INVOICE_LENGTH, sod.NO_OF_BEND_PC, sod.NO_OF_CUT_PC, 
    sod.NO_ROLLING_PC, sod.Z_PIECES, sod.LOCATION, sod.REMARKS, sod.SITE_CONTACT_PERSON, sod.Z_CW_DIA, 					
    sod.Z_CW_LEN, sod.Z_CW_OVR_HANG1, sod.Z_CW_OVR_HANG2, sod.Z_CW_SPA, sod.Z_ELEM_TYPE, sod.Z_MW_DIA, sod.Z_MW_LEN, sod.Z_MW_OVR_HANG1, sod.Z_MW_OVR_HANG2, sod.Z_MW_SPA,
    sod.PROD_MARKG, sod.WBS1, sod.WBS2, sod.WBS3, sod.WBS4, sod.WBS5, sod.Z_MAC_NO, sod.Z_NO_OF_PNT, sod.Z_NO_OF_STR, sod.Z_TOTAL_BEND, sod.Z_TOTAL_CUT, sod.BAR_MARK, 
    sod.NO_MW_PC, sod.NO_CW_PC, sod.ACT_MW_LEN, sod.SLOPE, sod.PIN_DIAMETER, sod.SEG_A, sod.SEG_B, 					
    sod.SEG_C, sod.SEG_D, sod.SEG_E, sod.SEG_F, sod.SEG_G, sod.SEG_H, sod.SEG_I, sod.SEG_J, sod.SEG_K, sod.SEG_L, sod.SEG_M, sod.SEG_N,sod.SEG_O, sod.SEG_R, sod.SEG_S, 					
    sod.SEG_T, sod.HT_H, sod.AN_P, sod.AN_Q, sod.AN_R, sod.AN_S, sod.AN_T, sod.AN_U, sod.AN_V, sod.AN_W, sod.HT_B, sod.HT_C, sod.HT_D, sod.LEG, sod.HOOK, sod.MW_TYPE, sod.CW_TYPE, 
    sod.T_THEO_KG, sod.T_NET_KG, sod.T_BOM, sod.T_MWOH1, sod.T_MWSP, sod.T_MWPC, sod.T_CWPC, sod.T_CWSP, sod.T_MHOH2, sod.T_CWOH1,sod.T_CWOH2, sod.T_REVERSE, sod.T_COMBINE, sod.T_FORCE, 
    sod.T_PTCM01, sod.T_PTCM02, sod.T_PTCM03, sod.T_PTCM04, sod.T_PTCM05, sod.T_PTCM06, sod.T_PTCM07, sod.T_PTCM08, sod.T_PTCM09, sod.T_PTCM10, sod.T_PTCC01, sod.T_PTCC02, 
    sod.T_PTCC03, sod.T_PTCC04, sod.T_PTCC05, sod.T_PTCC06, sod.T_PTCC07, sod.T_PTCC08, sod.T_PTCC09, sod.T_PTCC10, sod.T_DEL_DIR, sod.T_DEL_DIS, sod.T_DEL_TIME, 
    sod.T_CAB_PROD_LEN, sod.T_CUT_TIME, sod.T_BEND_TIME, sod.T_STK_TIME
FROM 
    dbo.SAP_ORDER_DATA sod
JOIN 
    WMBESMbny2gto wmb
ON 
    sod.TRACKNO = wmb.TRACK_NO
WHERE 
    wmb.STATUS='Q' and wmb.transfer_status!='P'

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT top 1
    sod.MANDT, sod.TRACKNO, sod.Z_ITEM_NO, sod.Creation_Date, sod.CREATED_BY, sod.ORDER_TYPE, sod.CONTRACT_NO, sod.PROJ_ID, sod.CUSTOMER_ID, sod.PO_NUM, sod.PO_Date, 
    sod.REQ_DELI_DATE, sod.OVER_DELIVERY_TOLERANCE, sod.UUNDER_DELIVERY_TOLERANCE, sod.ITEM_NO, sod.MATL_NO,					
    sod.ORD_QTY, sod.SALES_UOM, sod.NUMERATOR, sod.UOM_1, sod.DENOMINATOR, sod.UOM_2, sod.HG_ITEM_NO, sod.VALUATION_TYPE, sod.SO_NO, sod.BATCH_NO,					
    sod.SO_STATUS, sod.BT_STATUS, sod.BBS_NO, sod.BBS_DESC, sod.SHAPE_CODE, sod.Z_SHAPE_SURCHARG, sod.Z_PROD_DATE, sod.INVOICE_LENGTH, sod.NO_OF_BEND_PC, sod.NO_OF_CUT_PC, 
    sod.NO_ROLLING_PC, sod.Z_PIECES, sod.LOCATION, sod.REMARKS, sod.SITE_CONTACT_PERSON, sod.Z_CW_DIA, 					
    sod.Z_CW_LEN, sod.Z_CW_OVR_HANG1, sod.Z_CW_OVR_HANG2, sod.Z_CW_SPA, sod.Z_ELEM_TYPE, sod.Z_MW_DIA, sod.Z_MW_LEN, sod.Z_MW_OVR_HANG1, sod.Z_MW_OVR_HANG2, sod.Z_MW_SPA,
    sod.PROD_MARKG, sod.WBS1, sod.WBS2, sod.WBS3, sod.WBS4, sod.WBS5, sod.Z_MAC_NO, sod.Z_NO_OF_PNT, sod.Z_NO_OF_STR, sod.Z_TOTAL_BEND, sod.Z_TOTAL_CUT, sod.BAR_MARK, 
    sod.NO_MW_PC, sod.NO_CW_PC, sod.ACT_MW_LEN, sod.SLOPE, sod.PIN_DIAMETER, sod.SEG_A, sod.SEG_B, 					
    sod.SEG_C, sod.SEG_D, sod.SEG_E, sod.SEG_F, sod.SEG_G, sod.SEG_H, sod.SEG_I, sod.SEG_J, sod.SEG_K, sod.SEG_L, sod.SEG_M, sod.SEG_N,sod.SEG_O, sod.SEG_R, sod.SEG_S, 					
    sod.SEG_T, sod.HT_H, sod.AN_P, sod.AN_Q, sod.AN_R, sod.AN_S, sod.AN_T, sod.AN_U, sod.AN_V, sod.AN_W, sod.HT_B, sod.HT_C, sod.HT_D, sod.LEG, sod.HOOK, sod.MW_TYPE, sod.CW_TYPE, 
    sod.T_THEO_KG, sod.T_NET_KG, sod.T_BOM, sod.T_MWOH1, sod.T_MWSP, sod.T_MWPC, sod.T_CWPC, sod.T_CWSP, sod.T_MHOH2, sod.T_CWOH1,sod.T_CWOH2, sod.T_REVERSE, sod.T_COMBINE, sod.T_FORCE, 
    sod.T_PTCM01, sod.T_PTCM02, sod.T_PTCM03, sod.T_PTCM04, sod.T_PTCM05, sod.T_PTCM06, sod.T_PTCM07, sod.T_PTCM08, sod.T_PTCM09, sod.T_PTCM10, sod.T_PTCC01, sod.T_PTCC02, 
    sod.T_PTCC03, sod.T_PTCC04, sod.T_PTCC05, sod.T_PTCC06, sod.T_PTCC07, sod.T_PTCC08, sod.T_PTCC09, sod.T_PTCC10, sod.T_DEL_DIR, sod.T_DEL_DIS, sod.T_DEL_TIME, 
    sod.T_CAB_PROD_LEN, sod.T_CUT_TIME, sod.T_BEND_TIME, sod.T_STK_TIME
FROM 
    dbo.SAP_ORDER_DATA sod
JOIN 
    WMBESMbny2gto wmb
ON 
    sod.TRACKNO = wmb.TRACK_NO
WHERE 
    wmb.STATUS='Q' and wmb.transfer_status!='P'

text.value: UPDATE dbo.ESM_SAP_TRACK SET ESB_STATUS = 'E' and STATUS_DATE = getdate() where TRACK_NO = {pipeline().parameters.TRACKNO} and STATUS = 'Q'
